data.title: The Steak & Seafood Restaurant of the NY Yankees
data.meta_description: Satisfy your cravings for steak and seafood whether you're in New York City or Coconut Creek, Florida, thanks to the two NYY Steak locations in Yankee Stadium and Seminole Casino.
data.text:
Welcome to NYY Steak

With one location in Coconut Creek, Florida, and one location in New York City, NYY Steak offers delicious steak and seafood in world-famous Seminole Casino and Yankee Stadium. Enjoy fresh seafood and dry-aged USDA Prime steaks while sipping spirits or one of our nearly 100 wine selections. Our NYY Steak locations both feature eight flat-screen LCD TVs, a stylish interior with Mozambique wood walls, black oak floors, and antique bronze mirrors in the ceilings, as well as custom "signature walls" featuring autographs of legendary Yankees players.
